titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a pilot program to provide hospital care and medical services to veterans in the Freely Associated States of the Republic of Palau, the Republic of the Marshall Islands, and the Federated States of Micronesia, and to conduct a study on the feasibility and advisability of establishing regional offices, suboffices, contact units, or other subordinate offices of the Department of Veterans Affairs in the Freely Associated States to provide such care and services, and for other purposes.
COFA Veterans Review Act of 2019
COFA Veterans Review Act of 2019
Compact of Free Association Veterans Review Act of 2019
Compact of Free Association Veterans Review Act of 2019
COFA Veterans Review Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
